name: recommend
description: Recommend top 3 games for users in the current voice channel

options.name: include
options.description: Comma delineated names of the users to include in addition to those currently in the channel

options.name: exclude
options.description: Comma delineated name of the users to exclude from recommendation.

options.name: display-count
options.description: Number of top games to display. Defaults to 5
